title: FUSE Actor Knowledge Schema
description: Schema for individual FUSE actor analysis

category.description: Domain category (equilibrium, transport, build, heating, etc.)

hierarchy.description: Whether this is a single actor or compound actor

description.description: Brief description of what this actor does

physics_domain.description: Physics/engineering domain this actor operates in

data_inputs.description: IMAS data paths that this actor reads from

data_outputs.description: IMAS data paths that this actor writes to

sub_actors.description: Sub-actors for compound actors (empty for single actors)

usage_notes.description: Important usage notes, warnings, or best practices
